actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To establish a National Clearinghouse for Character Education.
short_title: Commitment to Kids and Character Act

summary.text: Commitment to Kids and Character Act - Authorizes a grant to be made to a tax-exempt organization with specified qualifications to establish and support the operation of a National Clearinghouse for Character Education.Sets forth requirements for Clearinghouse functions and such organization's reports.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Commitment to Kids and Character Act
To establish a National Clearinghouse for Character Education.
